episodes.title: Live Free or Die
episodes.plot: Now that Gus is dead, Walt, Jesse, and Mike work to cover their tracks. Skyler panics when Ted Beneke wakes up.

episodes.title: Madrigal
episodes.plot: Walt and Jesse seek out an unlikely partner for a new business venture. The DEA follows up new leads in its investigation.

episodes.title: Hazard Pay
episodes.plot: The guys put a business plan into action; Walt confesses to Marie.

episodes.title: Fifty-One
episodes.plot: It's Walt's 51st birthday. His return to the drug business causes Skyler to go into depression.

episodes.title: Dead Freight
episodes.plot: Walter White's domestic life continues to deteriorate; at the same time, his growing business venture aims to steal a train car chock full of methylamine.

episodes.title: Buyout
episodes.plot: In the aftermath of the train heist, Jesse and Mike decide to quit the business, leaving Walt to handle things on his own. Mike is being followed by the DEA.

episodes.title: Say My Name
episodes.plot: Mike and Jesse are out. Now Walt has to handle things on his own. Hank finally finds a rat in Mike's gang.

episodes.title: Gliding Over All
episodes.plot: Walt expands his business overseas, and the money is pouring in.

episodes.title: Blood Money
episodes.plot: Walt is out of the meth business and trying to move on with his life. Jesse tries to get rid of his money. Hank now knows that Walt is the famous Heisenberg.

episodes.title: Buried
episodes.plot: Hank is determined to bring down Walt. Walt scrambles to hide evidence before Hank gets to it, and Skyler tries to stop Hank and Marie from taking away the kids.

episodes.title: Confessions
episodes.plot: Walt makes his next move against Hank, putting Hank in a tough position. Hank confronts Jesse and attempts to turn him against Walt, and Jesse decides it's time to move on. Meanwhile, Todd has taken over the business.

episodes.title: Rabid Dog
episodes.plot: Walt discovers Jesse broke into his house and attempted to burn it down. Walt wants to protect his family so he moves them into a hotel for a few nights. Jesse makes plans to take down Walt.

episodes.title: To'hajiilee
episodes.plot: Jesse and Hank come up with an idea to take Walt down. Walt hires Todd's uncle to kill Jesse.

episodes.title: Ozymandias
episodes.plot: Walt goes on the run. Jesse is taken hostage. Marie convinces Skyler to tell Walter, Jr. the truth.

episodes.title: Granite State
episodes.plot: Walt struggles as he adapts to aspects of his new identity. Jesse plans an escape against Jack and his crew.

episodes.title: Felina
episodes.plot: Walter White makes one last attempt to secure his family's future, while also visiting some old enemies, during his final return to Albuquerque.
